description: Updates the status of one or more versions of a package. Using UpdatePackageVersionsStatus, you can update the status of package versions to Archived, Published, or Unlisted. To set the status of a package version to Disposed, use DisposePackageVersions.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: The name of the domain that contains the repository that contains the package versions with a status to be updated.

parameters.name: repository
parameters.description: The repository that contains the package versions with the status you want to update.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: A format that specifies the type of the package with the statuses to update.

parameters.name: namespace
parameters.description: The namespace of the package version to be updated. The package component that specifies its namespace depends on its type. For example: The namespace of a Maven package version is its groupId. The namespace of an npm or Swift package version is its scope. The namespace of a generic package is its namespace. Python, NuGet, Ruby, and Cargo package versions do not contain a corresponding component, package versions of those formats do not have a namespace.

parameters.name: package
parameters.description: The name of the package with the version statuses to update.

parameters.name: versions
parameters.description: An array of strings that specify the versions of the package with the statuses to update. (string) ---

parameters.name: versionRevisions
parameters.description: A map of package versions and package version revisions. The map key is the package version (for example, 3.5.2), and the map value is the package version revision. (string) --- (string) ---

parameters.name: targetStatus
parameters.description: The status you want to change the package version status to.

nested_items.name: successfulVersions
nested_items.description: A list of PackageVersionError objects, one for each package version with a status that failed to update.

nested_items.name: revision
nested_items.description: The revision of a package version.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of a package version.

nested_items.name: failedVersions
nested_items.description: A list of SuccessfulPackageVersionInfo objects, one for each package version with a status that successfully updated.

nested_items.name: errorCode
nested_items.description: The error code associated with the error. Valid error codes are:

nested_items.name: errorMessage
nested_items.description: The error message associated with the error.
